籤詩版本二:
Lokacin da wasan dara na abokin hamayya ya dace, wasan baki da fari bai yanke hukunci ba.
Dukanmu mun san nasara ko shan kashi saboda motsi ɗaya, muna bukatar mu koya wa kanmu mu ba da shawarwari masu kyau.
詩意:
Wannan hexagram alama ce ta saduwa da abokin hamayya.
Yana da kyau a yi amfani da gabobi a cikin komai.
解曰: Sha'awa da tunani. Kamar Go. Nasara a karshe. Yana da kyau a yi amfani da makirci.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Jiang Wei da Deng Ai na yaƙi
A lokacin daular Uku, Jiang Wei (Shu) da Deng Ai (Wei)
Dakarun biyu sun hadu a Qishan, suka gwabza da juna a jere. Dakarun Wei da Shu duka sun fuskanci abokan gaba a cikin tsarin Bagua, a lokacin da sojojin biyu ke fafatawa, Jiang Wei ya daga tutarsa ​​yana sowa, kuma nan take samuwar Bagua ta rikide zuwa wata kafa mai nisa da maciji, inda ta kama Deng Ai. Daga baya Sima Wang ta cece shi.
(A misali, lokacin fuskantar yanayi mai mahimmanci, ya kamata ku yi amfani da hikima.)
聖意: Iyali da gida sun tabbata, zaman lafiya ya tabbata, kasuwanci ya yi nasara, ba a daidaita aure, mace mai tafiya a Liujia ta toshe gonaki, tsutsotsi da dabbobi sun lalace, an toshe bincike, shari’a ta dace da hijira. yana da ra'ayin mazan jiya, dukiyar da aka rasa babu kowa, cuta tana addu'ar kariya, kabarin dutse yana da ra'ayin mazan jiya
古人: Jiang Wei da Deng Ai suna fada
